parameters.jsCode:
// Runtime base URL with env fallback
let baseUrl = 'https://mastodon.social';
try {
  const envUrl = $env.MASTODON_TEST_URL;
  if (typeof envUrl === 'string' && envUrl.trim()) baseUrl = envUrl.trim();
} catch (_error) {}

return [{ json: {
  safeMode: true,
  baseUrl,
  // Optional explicit target for pin/unpin tests (leave empty to skip safely)
  pinAccountId: '',
  searchQuery: 'mastodon',
  hashtag: 'n8n',
  externalUrl: 'https://n8n.io',
  testDomain: 'example.invalid',
  testEmailDomain: 'mail.example.invalid',
  testTag: 'n8n',
  pendingFollowAccountId: '',
  followerAccountId: '',
  notificationId: '',
  conversationId: '',
  allowedDomainId: '',
  blockedDomainId: '',
  emailBlockedDomainId: '',
  canonicalEmailBlockId: '',
  dimensionId: '',
  ipRecordId: '',
  measureId: '',
  mediaId: '',
  pollId: '',
  scheduledStatusId: '',
  oauthClientId: '',
  oauthClientSecret: '',
  oauthCode: '',
  oauthTokenToRevoke: '',
  pushEndpoint: 'https://example.invalid/push',
  pushP256dh: 'BMkFakeP256dhKeyForTestingOnly',
  pushAuth: 'FakeAuthSecretForTestingOnly'
}}];
